data.title: 15 Best Cincinnati Reds Podcasts You Must Follow in 2024
data.meta_description: Best Cincinnati Reds Podcasts. Keep up-to-date with everything Cincinnati Reds including news, analysis, decisions, opinions, and interviews with Reds current & former players
data.text:
1. The Jim Day Podcast

Take deep dives with Reds broadcaster Jim Day as he interviews current & former Reds players, coaches, broadcasters, celebrities, and those that make news in the baseball & sports world. Jim will feature unique & relaxed conversations that will take you in between the lines & away from the field of play or the broadcast booth. Deep dive into what makes these celebrities tick as sports meets pop culture on the Jim Day Podcast.

Podcast podcasts.apple.com

Email

Apple Rating 5 / 5Twitter Followers 49.7K Frequency 1 episode / week Avg Length 48 min Since Feb 2019 Listen on Spotify Play Get Influential Podcasters ContactsGet access to 100k active Podcasters, Influencers in 1500 niche categories.Get targeted media contact list in your niche at your fingertips so you can focus on running your campaign.Email us the categories of Podcasters you want to reach out for your marketing campaign at anuj@feedspot.com Copy email. We'll share active Podcasters list with verified email contacts in an Excel or CSV format.Email us

2. The Riverfront: A Cincinnati Reds Show

Redleg Nation Radio (RNR), hosted by Chad Dotson and a rotating cast of characters, including former Reds players and broadcasters. RNR is a deep dive into the daily trials and tribulations of the Cincinnati Reds, filled with witty banter and the occasional reference to Lisalverto Bonilla.

Podcast redlegnation.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.6 / 5Facebook Followers 5KTwitter Followers 2.2K Frequency 1 episode / week Avg Length 64 min Since Jun 2006 Listen on Apple Spotify Video Podcast YouTube Play

3. Cincinnati Reds Podcast

Cincinnati Reds Podcast brings you three great shows: 'Reds Hot Stove League Show,' allowing you to keep up-to-date with everything Cincinnati Reds in the offseason with this weekly show from the Reds Radio Network, 'Reds Spring Training Game Recap,' providing daily highlights and analysis from 2020 Reds Spring Training games & 'MLB.com Extras,' with Reds beat reporters & national correspondents taking an inside look ahead at the storylines & developing news that impact the team's outlook.

Podcast cms.megaphone.fm

Email

Apple Rating 4.4 / 5Facebook Followers 1.2MTwitter Followers 962.2KInstagram Followers 758.7K Frequency 1 episode / day Avg Length 11 min Listen on Apple Spotify Play

4. The Big Pod Machine

Reds Beat Podcast by Cincinnati Enquirer and hosted by John Fay and Bobby Nightengale.

Podcast audioboom.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.5 / 5Twitter Followers 47.4K Frequency 8 episodes / year Avg Length 38 min Since Nov 2013 Listen on Apple Spotify Play

5. The Hunt for Reds October Podcast

The Hunt For Reds October - A Cincinnati Reds Podcast with Coop and friends.

Podcast soundcloud.com

Email

Twitter Followers 884 Frequency 2 episodes / quarter Avg Length 67 min Since Nov 2018 Listen on Apple Spotify Play

6. The New Nasty Boys

The New Nasty Boys is a Cincinnati Reds podcast for Armchair Media. Hosts Billy DeVore and Lee Kimbrell take on the MLB with their burns, give insight, and show their love of the Cincinnati Reds.

Podcast armchairallamericans.com

Email

Facebook Followers 63Twitter Followers 193Instagram Followers 655 Frequency 2 episodes / month Avg Length 77 min Since Feb 2019 Video Podcast YouTube Play

7. The 3 Old Reds Fans Podcast

The 3 Old Reds Fans are Jeff Gilbert, Tom Sizer, and Kim Jenerette. We love baseball and the Cincinnati Reds, we talk about the Reds as often as we can and we just might have a good insight or two now and then.

Podcast 3oldredsfans.podbean.com

Email

Facebook Followers 122Twitter Followers 75 Frequency 1 episode / month Avg Length 64 min Since Apr 2017 Listen on YouTube Play

8. Reds Recall

We are an in-depth Cincinnati Reds podcast that covers all things Reds. The podcast is hosted by Cole Berding and Kyle Berger, two lifelong Cincinnati Reds fans, looking to provide news and entertainment to all willing to listen.

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Email

Apple Rating 5 / 5Twitter Followers 42 Frequency 10 episodes / year Avg Length 47 min Listen on Apple Play

9. Red Reporter

The Red Reporter podcast is a podcast about the Cincinnati Reds.

Podcast redreporter.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.7 / 5Facebook Followers 10.8KTwitter Followers 19.1K Since Jan 2017 Listen on Apple YouTube Play

10. Reds Fan Podcast

Reds Fan Podcast hosted by Jordan Biddle. In this podcast, he talks about the heated Reds games and how things look with your Cincinnati Reds and some of the good and bad going on with our favorite club!

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Apple Rating 5 / 5 Frequency 2 episodes / year Avg Length 26 min Since Apr 2019 Listen on Apple Play

11. Reds Fans Chatter

We discuss everything Reds Baseball. Episodes will include weekly recaps, hot stove, and in-depth analysis.

Podcast redview.podbean.com

Email

Apple Rating 5 / 5 Listen on Apple Play

12. Reds Line

A podcast all about Cincinnati Reds Talk.

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Apple Rating 3.3 / 5 Since Mar 2019 Listen on Apple Play

13. WARP In Cincinnati

Join C. Trent Rosecrans and Paul Dehner Jr. every week as WARP in Cincinnati takes you inside the Reds' clubhouse & front office for insights on all the moves, decisions, and opinions shaping the Reds.

Podcast warp-in-cincinnati.simplecast.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.9 / 5Twitter Followers 78.3K Since Feb 2020 Listen on Apple Play
